ingredients: +   1/4 cup butter, 4 large tart apples - peeled, cored and sliced 1/4 inch thick,   +   1/2 cup cold water, 2 teaspoons cornstarch,   +   1/2 cup brown sugar,   +   1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon
